snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry, after meeting with the Saudi foreign minister, also criticized Iran and Russia for helping arm the Assad government.
abstract: Secretary of State John Kerry says that Syrian opposition is capable of properly handling military support it receives; Kerry's comments follow conference in Rome on issue of building support for coalition of opponents to Syrian government of Pres Bashar al-Assad.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry, after meeting with the Saudi foreign minister, also criticized Iran and Russia for helping arm the Assad government.

headline.seo: Kerry Criticizes Iran and Russia for Shipping Arms to Syria
headline.main: Kerry Says Syrian Opposition Can Handle Military Aid
headline.print_headline: Kerry Says Syrian Opposition Can Handle Military Aid
